attributes.background: she is a discrace to the UK her action in this country are discusting yet we let her get away with it I say no more she doesn't care about people on the streets she only cares about what makes her money she thinks kids are fine living homeless her attitude should not be tolerated to the UK public

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that. If you want there to be a General Election, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/204379
